title: (x) $1 - Signature Black {Mike}
content:
Can anyone ID the font - sorry only 2 letterforms.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1dollar.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043121/http:/typophile.com/files/1dollar.jpg) | 17.93 KB |

 [‹ Sans Serif Type ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043121/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44024 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Looking for a vintage 30s script - similar to Trafton Script {Paul H} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043121/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44017 "Go to next forum topic")
author: evan

comments.content:
Evan,

take a look at one of these two:

[ITC Tiepolo Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/tiepolo/blk/)

[Dragon EF Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dragon/ef-bold/)

\_\_  
 [www.typeoff.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043121/http:/www.typeoff.de/ "www.typeoff.de")

Baker Signet is close but it needs to be a heavier weight still.  
(That sample looks so familiar - has to be an olide!)

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/baker-signet/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/baker-signet/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/baker-signet/")

I think you are looking for [Signature Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828043121/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=203125), one of Agfa’s versions of Baker Signet.

- Mike Yanega

Can you tell me if the Signature Black font will work on Windows? When I look at it, it looks like it is just for Mac. Also, is there a way in InDesign to bold Baker Signet? That is what I am really trying to do. Thanks.
